events.title: John Keats moves in with Fanny Brawne before leaving for Italy

movie.title: Bright Star
movie.plot: In 1818, high-spirited young Fanny Brawne finds herself increasingly intrigued by the handsome but aloof poet John Keats, who lives next door to her family friends the Dilkes. After reading a book of his poetry, she finds herself even more drawn to the taciturn Keats. Although he agrees to teach her about poetry, Keats cannot act on his reciprocated feelings for Fanny, since as a struggling poet he has no money to support a wife.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 16 wins & 52 nominations.

movie.title: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
movie.plot: A small town band makes it big, but loses track of their roots, as they get caught up into the big-time machinations of the music biz. Now, they must thwart a plot to destroy their home town. Built around the music of the beatles, this musical uses some big name groups like Peter Frampton and Aerosmith.

events.title: Leeds lose to Liverpool in a Charity Shield match

movie.title: The Damned United
movie.plot: Taking over Leeds United, Brian Clough's abrasive approach and his clear dislike of the players' dirty style of play make it certain there is going to be friction. Glimpses of his earlier career help explain both his hostility to previous manager Don Revie and how much he is missing right-hand man Peter Taylor.

events.title: the real Son of Sam is captured

movie.title: Summer of Sam
movie.plot: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American South Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

movie.title: The Iceman
movie.plot: The true story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man.

movie.title: Paranormal Activity 2
movie.plot: Days after welcoming a newborn baby, Dan and Kristi Rey return home one day to find their house ransacked with seemingly no explanation. Their fear forces them to put in security cameras, which begin to capture strange activity around the house.
